sourcesContent:
import {Component} from 'react' import {v4 as uuidv4} from 'uuid' import './index.css' import PasswordList from '../PasswordList' class PasswordManager extends Component { state = { listItems: [], websiteName: '', userName: '', password: '', } onChangeWebsite = event => { this.setState({websiteName: event.target.value}) } onChangeUserName = event => { this.setState({userName: event.target.value}) } onChangePassword = event => { this.setState({password: event.target.value}) } addUserDetails = event => { event.preventDefault() const {websiteName, userName, password} = this.state const newUser = { id: uuidv4(), websiteName, userName, password, } this.setState(prevState => ({ listItems: [...prevState.listItems, newUser], websiteName: '', userName: '', password: '', })) } onDeletinguserList = id => { const {listItems} = this.state const filterListUser = listItems.filter(eachUser => eachUser.id !== id) this.setState({listItems: filterListUser}) } onChangeSearch = event => { const {listItems} = this.state const searchVal = event.target.value const filterResultList = listItems.filter(eachUser => eachUser.websiteName.toLowerCase().includes(searchVal.toLowerCase()), ) this.setState({listItems: filterResultList}) } render() { const {listItems, websiteName, userName, password} = this.state const countNum = listItems.length return (

Add New Password

Your Passwords

{countNum}

{listItems.length === 0 ? (

No Passwords

) : (
    {listItems.map(eachItem => ( ))}
)}
) } } export default PasswordManager
